tool_description: Analyzes environmental factors affecting hair health including climate, water quality, pollution, and lifestyle factors to identify potential stressors.

climate_type.description: Local climate: humid, dry, temperate, tropical, or arid

water_hardness.description: Water mineral content: soft, moderate, hard, or very_hard

pollution_level.description: Air quality/pollution exposure: low, moderate, high, or severe

sun_exposure_hours.description: Average daily sun exposure in hours (0-16)

indoor_heating_cooling.description: Whether frequently exposed to indoor heating/AC

swimming_frequency.description: Pool/ocean swimming frequency: never, monthly, weekly, daily

exercise_intensity.description: Exercise sweating level: low, moderate, high, or intense

error_messages: Invalid climate type: Must be one of [humid, dry, temperate, tropical, arid]
Invalid water hardness: Must be one of [soft, moderate, hard, very_hard]
Invalid pollution level: Must be one of [low, moderate, high, severe]
Invalid sun exposure: Must be a number between 0 and 16
Invalid swimming frequency: Must be one of [never, monthly, weekly, daily]
Invalid exercise intensity: Must be one of [low, moderate, high, intense]
Missing required parameters: climate_type, water_hardness, pollution_level, sun_exposure_hours, and indoor_heating_cooling are required
usage: Provide climate type, water hardness, pollution level, sun exposure hours, and indoor heating/cooling exposure. Optionally specify swimming frequency and exercise intensity. Returns environmental risk assessment with protective recommendations.
